name: Ultimate Hitman vs Dino Wild
description: Experience the thrill of shooting against Dino. Dino is very angry and if you go toward then they will attack you and try to kill at any cost,So you be a commando. You play like a commando which is not frightened at any enemy. So when dinosaurs  attack you then you should be best shooting on awesome weapons. You have bundle of weapons and choose according to requirement. Jungle is very dangerous in your health because there are man Dino who want to killed you . So on the way carefully run  and complete mission . Every level more interested step by step level make more adventure. So why are you waiting pick weapon and start shooting and complete every missions. Best of luck
